abstract.p: Norman Kiell letter on Aug 22 article cites other examples of doctors who are also authors

block.p: There is a whole library of medical practitioners, besides Chekhov and William Carlos Williams, who are cited in ''Patients Are Discovering 'My Doctor, the Author' '' (Aug. 22). Dr. W. Somerset Maugham is one of the most noted. More recent is the sci-fi writer, Dr. Michael Crichton, who never practiced medicine.

Dr. Oliver Sacks loves to write about the psychiatric, neurological and whimsical. Dr. William James is perhaps America's greatest philosopher-psychologist. Some regard Dr. Arthur Schnitzler as one of Austria's greatest novelists. Dr. Louis-Ferdinand Celine wrote passionately about the downtrodden of France. Dr. Walker Percy was a novelist of the South.
